CovariateSearcher: Quick Reference

CovariateSearcher Package 2025-11-06

üöÄ Minimal Working Example 

library(CovariateSearcher)

# 1. Initialize
search_state <- initialize_covariate_search(
  base_model_path = "models/run10",
  data_file_path = "data/analysis.csv",
  covariate_search_path = "data/covariates.csv"
)

# 2. Run SCM
results <- run_automated_scm_testing(
  search_state = search_state,
  base_model_id = "run10",
  scm_type = "standard",
  starting_phase = "forward",
  full_scm = TRUE
)

# 3. Check results
print(results$final_model)
print(results$final_covariates)

üìã Required Files

1. Base Model

models/run10/run10.ctl - NONMEM control file

Requirements:

$THETA
; Simple parameter names (no TV_ prefix in THETA block!)
0.5 ; CL ; L/h ; LOG
10  ; V  ; L   ; LOG
; OR numbered format
0.5 ; 1_CL ; L/h ; LOG
10  ; 2_V  ; L   ; LOG

$PK
; Use TV_ prefix in PK block for typical values
TV_CL = THETA(1)
TV_V  = THETA(2)
CL = TV_CL * EXP(ETA(1))
V  = TV_V  * EXP(ETA(2))

$OMEGA BLOCK(2)
0.1 ; IIV_CL ; ; RATIO
0.1 ; IIV_V  ; ; RATIO

$SIGMA
0.1 ; RUV ; ; RATIO

Format: value ; NAME ; units ; RATIO|LOG

THETA Naming: Use simple names (e.g., CL, V) or numbered (e.g., 1_CL, 2_V) in $THETA block. Use TV_ prefix only in PK/PRED block.

2. Dataset

data/analysis.csv - NONMEM dataset with covariates

3. Covariate Search

data/covariates.csv

PARAMETER,COVARIATE,STATUS,FORMULA,LEVELS,REFERENCE,TIME_DEPENDENT
CL,WT,continuous,linear,NA,NA,FALSE
CL,AGE,continuous,linear,NA,NA,FALSE
CL,SEX,categorical,linear,2,1,FALSE
V2,WT,continuous,linear,NA,NA,FALSE

üéØ Main Functions

Initialize 

search_state <- initialize_covariate_search(
  base_model_path,
  data_file_path,
  covariate_search_path
)

Run Complete SCM 

results <- run_automated_scm_testing(
  search_state,
  base_model_id,
  scm_type = "standard",      # or "selective"
  starting_phase = "forward", # or "backward"
  full_scm = TRUE
)

Validate Base Model 

validate_base_model_parameters("models/run10")

Save/Load State 

save_search_state(search_state, "state.rds")
search_state <- load_search_state("state.rds")

üìä Workflow Types

Standard SCM 

starting_phase = "forward"
full_scm = TRUE

‚ûú Forward ‚Üí Backward

SCM+ 

starting_phase = "backward"
full_scm = TRUE

‚ûú Backward ‚Üí Forward ‚Üí Backward

Forward Only 

starting_phase = "forward"
full_scm = FALSE

‚ûú Forward only

‚öôÔ∏è Common Parameters

Parameter Default Options
scm_type ‚Äústandard‚Äù ‚Äústandard‚Äù, ‚Äúselective‚Äù
starting_phase ‚Äúforward‚Äù ‚Äúforward‚Äù, ‚Äúbackward‚Äù
full_scm TRUE TRUE, FALSE
forward_p_value 0.05 0.001-0.1
backward_p_value 0.01 0.001-0.1
rse_threshold 50 30-100
auto_submit TRUE TRUE, FALSE
auto_retry TRUE TRUE, FALSE

üìù Check Results 

# Final model
results$final_model

# Final covariates
results$final_covariates

# Excluded covariates
results$excluded_covariates

# View database
View(results$search_state$search_database)

# Summary
cat(results$final_summary)

üìà Model Selection Criteria

Model selected if BOTH: 1. ŒîOFV > threshold 2. RSE < threshold (default: 50%)

Thresholds: - Forward: ŒîOFV > 3.84 (p=0.05) - Backward: ŒîOFV > 6.63 (p=0.01)

‚ö†Ô∏è Common Issues

Base model validation fails

‚ûú Fix parameter format: value ; NAME ; units ; RATIO|LOG

High RSE rejecting models

‚ûú Increase threshold: rse_threshold = 100

Models failing

‚ûú Check: search_state$search_database$estimation_issue

Need to resume

‚ûú Load checkpoint: load_search_state("scm_auto_forward_complete.rds")

üíæ Checkpoints (Auto-saved)

  • scm_auto_forward_complete.rds
  • scm_auto_initial_backward_complete.rds
  • scm_auto_final_backward_complete.rds
  • scm_auto_final_complete.rds

üé® Parameter Format Examples

THETA (Population Parameters)

IMPORTANT: Use simple names or numbered format in $THETA block (NO TV_ prefix!)

$THETA
; Option 1: Simple names (recommended)
(0, 0.5, 100) ; CL ; L/h ; LOG
(0, 10)       ; V  ; L   ; LOG
0.5 FIX       ; KA ; 1/h ; LOG

; Option 2: Numbered format
(0, 0.5, 100) ; 1_CL ; L/h ; LOG
(0, 10)       ; 2_V  ; L   ; LOG
0.5 FIX       ; 3_KA ; 1/h ; LOG

Then in $PK block, use TV_ prefix for typical values:

$PK
TV_CL = THETA(1)  ; Use TV_ prefix here
TV_V  = THETA(2)
TV_KA = THETA(3)

CL = TV_CL * EXP(ETA(1))
V  = TV_V  * EXP(ETA(2))
KA = TV_KA * EXP(ETA(3))

‚úÖ Correct THETA naming: CL, V, KA or 1_CL, 2_V, 3_KA
‚ùå Wrong THETA naming: TV_CL, TVCL, TVV (don‚Äôt use TV_ in $THETA block!)

OMEGA Diagonal 

$OMEGA
0.1 ; IIV_CL ; ; RATIO
0.1 ; IIV_V  ; ; RATIO

OMEGA BLOCK (One value per line!) 

$OMEGA BLOCK(3)
0.1 ; IIV_CL    ; ; RATIO
0.1 ; IIV_CL_V  ; ; RATIO
0.1 ; IIV_V     ; ; RATIO

SIGMA 

$SIGMA
0.1  ; RUV_PROP ; ; RATIO
0.05 ; RUV_ADD  ; mg/L ; RATIO

‚ùå WRONG (multiple values per line):

$OMEGA BLOCK(3)
0.1 ; IIV_CL
0.1 0.1 ; IIV_V      ‚Üê Don't do this!

‚ùå WRONG (TV_ prefix in THETA block):

$THETA
0.5 ; TV_CL ; L/h ; LOG    ‚Üê Don't use TV_ in $THETA block!
0.5 ; TVCL ; L/h ; LOG     ‚Üê Missing underscore

üìã Complete Correct Example 

$THETA
; Simple names in THETA block
0.5 ; CL ; L/h ; LOG
10  ; V  ; L   ; LOG
1   ; KA ; 1/h ; LOG

$PK
; TV_ prefix used here in PK block
TV_CL = THETA(1)
TV_V  = THETA(2)
TV_KA = THETA(3)

CL = TV_CL * EXP(ETA(1))
V  = TV_V  * EXP(ETA(2))
KA = TV_KA * EXP(ETA(3))

$OMEGA BLOCK(3)
0.1 ; IIV_CL ; ; RATIO
0.1 ; IIV_CL_V ; ; RATIO
0.1 ; IIV_V ; ; RATIO

$SIGMA
0.1 ; RUV_PROP ; ; RATIO

üîß Advanced Options

Selective Forward (Faster) 

scm_type = "selective"

Custom Thresholds 

forward_p_value = 0.01,    # More stringent
backward_p_value = 0.001,  # Very stringent
rse_threshold = 30         # Stricter

Resume Interrupted 

search_state <- load_search_state("scm_auto_forward_complete.rds")
results <- run_backward_elimination(
  search_state,
  starting_model = "run85"
)
